0.1.name: wordpress/logged-in
0.1.description: Allows you to close your site to non-logged in users, by redirecting them to the login page, displaying a message or a specific template file. The plugin can be configured to redirect visitors to login page, display a short message using your themes layout or display a fallback file located in your stylesheet_directory.
